text: AWS for Advertising
and Marketing provides a comprehensive set of guidance
to accelerate your organization's marketing
and advertising technology efforts.
When you build with instructional guidelines developed
by AWS, you'll innovate faster and operate more efficiently.
You can get started by using guidance
and solutions across five essential solution areas: Audience
and Customer Data Management, Privacy Enhanced Data
Collaboration, Ad Intelligence and Measurement, Ad Platforms,
and Digital Customer Experience.
There are many guidance resources
with the AWS Solutions Library
to help you achieve your organization's
advertising and marketing goals.
Let's review a few of those solutions now.
In today's fast-paced advertising landscape,
the ability to bid in real time is crucial
for staying competitive. Guidance for building a real-time
bidder for advertising on AWS helps you quickly get started
with developing a real-time bidding site
and to evaluate the
performance of your bidding infrastructure
on AWS. It provides a framework with best practices,
including sample code
and load testing drivers to accelerate the development
and evaluation of a real-time bidding system.
Using high throughput, low latency data stores,
this guidance helps you make quick informed decisions
for bidding on ad opportunities.
It then stores and analyzes the impression
and transaction data for analytics and optimization.
It also uses microservices
and other AWS best practices to increase scalability,
improve security, and implement faster changes using a
special deployment pipeline.
Customers are using this guidance to successfully migrate
and regionalize bidder sites
with AWS. The adoption of machine learning strategies
for near real-time advertising not only streamlines the
process, but also enhances the effectiveness
of ad auction server applications.
With an increasingly intricate demand
for such optimization in the advertising industry,
Guidance for Machine Learning
for near real-time advertising on AWS
offers a robust solution.
This guidance helps you build, train,
and deploy machine learning modules
to an ad auction server application.
It also separates model creation
and model consumption into different spaces.
It provides a machine learning operational pipeline
to handle model training and inferencing at real-time.
advertising scale for use cases such as bid filtering,
predicting impression values, and forecasting.
The guidance provides bid filtering reference code
to help reduce processing costs related
to unanswered bid requests, along
with best practice implementations to enhance security
and scalability, both up and down.
This helps you reduce unanswered bid requests,
enhance security, and makes it easier
to scale when necessary.
Reliable unified data provides businesses
with a better understanding of their customers,
improves customer experiences,
and can help business leaders make informed decisions.
With guidance for customer data platform on AWS,
you can build a well architected
and composable customer data platform using consumer
touch points, event and data sources, and enterprise data.
It starts with extracting batched in real-time data streams.
Then it shows you how to cleanse, enrich,
and process the data to make a unified customer profile
across all data sources.
Finally, the process data is ready
for analysis and collaboration
in a secure environment where you set the controls.
The data can be used to build more personalized customer
experiences and enhance the outcomes
of customer interactions and marketing efforts.
As the advertising and marketing landscape becomes
increasingly complex
and competitive, guidance resources from AWS provide
businesses with the tools and frameworks they need
to stay ahead. Visit the AWS Solutions Library
to view more guidance resources
to innovate your advertising and marketing endeavors.
